sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNLOGINLOG ( LOG_ID , CONECT_MTHD , CONECT_ID , CONECT_IP , ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT , ERROR_CODE , CREAT_DT ) VALUES ( #logId# , #loginMthd# , #loginId# , #loginIp# , #errOccrrAt# , #errorCode# , getdate())
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.LOG_ID , FORMAT(CAST(a.CREAT_DT AS DATE), 'yyyy-MM-dd') CREAT_DT , a.CONECT_MTHD , a.CONECT_IP , a.CONECT_ID , b.USER_NM AS LOGIN_NM FROM LETTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.LOG_ID = #logId#

SELECT a.LOG_ID , FORMAT(CAST(a.CREAT_DT AS DATE), 'yyyy-MM-dd') CREAT_DT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT 1)) AS NO , a.CONECT_MTHD , a.CONECT_IP , a.CONECT_ID , b.USER_NM AS LOGIN_NM FROM LETTNLOGINLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.CONECT_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
a.CONECT_MTHD LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%') ORDER BY a.LOG_ID
convert(varchar, a.CREAT_DT, 112) BETWEEN FORMAT(CAST(#searchBgnDe# AS DATE), 'yyyyMMdd') AND FORMAT(CAST(#searchEndDe# AS DATE), 'yyyyMMdd')
ORDER BY a.CREAT_DT DESC OFFSET #firstIndex# ROWS FETCH FIRST #recordCountPerPage# ROWS ONLY
